home.message: Experience unprecedented affordability in urban living!
home.m2: Just 5 minutes from Downtown Ottawa and the vibrant Byward Market
home.faqA1: Each of our residences comes equipped with essential appliances, including a washer, dryer, dishwasher, oven, fridge, and microwave.
home.faqQ2: How can I arrange a property tour?
home.faqA2: To schedule a property tour, kindly reach out to us at: jadomansour@gmail.com or (873) 353-8190.
home.faqA3: We provide parking for all our residents, with a winter fee for snow removal during the colder months.
home.faqQ4: What payment methods do you accept?
home.faqA4: We accept two convenient payment options: bank transfers and e-Transfers.
